strings.Value: "Death reminds me of things I'd rather forget."
"One more death… I've seen far too much of it."
"You could find consolation in my faith… but you are not yet ready, if you still try to avoid the inevitable."
"We all have bad memories that come to us in nightmares. Or in times like this."
"You carry a heavy burden of loss, but you still stand strong. Don't lose that now. The deaths of our friends must never break our spirit!"
"Those who constantly grieve over others never live for themselves. You're merely wasting time that you don't have much of. Such wasted life is worse by far than death."
"I know this pain. When it grips my heart with its cold hand, I look for solace in the song of the wind and the dancing clouds."
